name: Oven-Baked Caramel French Toast
author: HappyHousewife
summary: This is perfect served with quiche, homemade home fries and fresh coffee!  I make the bread for this recipe using my bread machine!
directions: In a small saucepan, combine 1 cup brown sugar, 1/2 cup butter and 2 tablespoons corn syrup
Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened
Pour sauce into a 9x13 inch baking dish and sprinkle with 1/2 cup pecans
Place 6 slices of bread on top of the sauce, sprinkle with the remaining pecans and cover with the remaining 6 slices of bread
Combine eggs, milk, vanilla, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt in a blender
Pour egg mixture evenly over bread slices, cover the baking dish, and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight
The next morning, preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Remove the   from the refrigerator 30 minutes prior to baking
Bake in preheated oven for 40 to 45 minutes, until lightly brown
Drizzle sauce over the toast right before serving
To make the Caramel Sauce:  In a small saucepan, combine 1/2 cup brown sugar, 1/4 cup butter and 1 tablespoon corn syrup
